mapper.insert: INSERT INTO all_product (num, boardname, companyid, category, category2, flavor, detail, isfile, delivery, reg, count, product, stock, expiry, price) VALUES (${companyid}_PRODUCT_SEQ.nextval, #{boardname}, #{companyid}, #{category}, #{category2}, #{flavor}, #{detail}, #{isfile}, #{delivery}, sysdate, #{count}, #{product}, #{stock}, #{expiry}, #{price})
INSERT INTO all_productimg (companyid, category, category2, flavor, num, ext, thum) VALUES (#{companyid}, #{category}, #{category2}, #{flavor}, ${companyid}_PRODUCTIMG_SEQ.nextval, #{ext}, #{thum})
